subject: Re: A few from Evp Maker
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
Yes, i help you.  I didn't hear "check it out".  I'm having a great 
time with this program, it's quite amazing actually.  You and Frank 
are definitely on to something with these methods, so what's next?  
Is there an EVP Maker part 2 in the works with echo?

-Steve H.


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Stefan Bion <yahoogroups@...> wrote:
>
> Hi Steve,
> 
> I listened to your files and was able to hear most of them. Just one
> comment: In the file "yes--to_help_you.mp3", after your 
question "Are
> you able to use EVPmaker throgh this", I can hear: "Yes, I help ... 
I
> help you, check it out".
> 
> Stefan
> 
> -- 
> 
> 
> > I've personally never had succes until today with EvpMaker.  It 
seems 
> > like they're talking loud and clear with that audio clip Stefan 
> > posted.  I am going to do another couple minute session later and 
see 
> > what i get, the answers i feel are pretty clear.  But, i would 
like to 
> > know if others are hearing them.  I suggest for people to 
experiment 
> > with this file through EvpMaker and see what you guys get.  I'm 
excited 
> > once again about the communication we are receiving.
> 
> > Thanx Stefan,
> > -Steve H.
>
